comment:
I read that tweet and article and, sorry, that is NOT a debunk at all and very far away from the definition of a debunk. Right now, nothing is clear up but Amber being fired for not passing her physical which caused her to become UNINSURABLE due to Drug-Related Issues is far more likely to occur than the issue being her body weight. At this point, we'll need to wait for the cast announcements which should be very soon.    

5:24secs - Hell no. If that happens, everyone including myself will think she is still 100% in Aquaman 2 as that is practically an official announcement.  It also means that tons of people will NOT Pay to see Aquaman 2 either, including me.  Frankly, this entire week proved that the response has been insanely positive and exciting to watch & pay to see Aquaman 2 when people believed that she is fired from the movie. In fact, metric and financial forecast for the movie massively spiked up, and the news trended WORLDWIDE. That means, beyond a shadow of a doubt, have Amber in the movie KILLS your business, so all companies would be in their very best interest to NOT hire her at all.  Sorry, I will never shed a tear for Amber because she only had herself to blame, especially as she lied to everyone including you and I for years and caused heaps of problems for sick children.

author: javier book shadows contributor du

comment:
The only reason stories like this get any traction is because a vocal minority on social media have a hate boner for Amber Heard. I'm not saying she doesn't deserve it. I think it's more than likely that both Depp and Heard treated each other like shit, and if we knew the whole story, it would turn out that all of the allegations against both are true. 

What people on social media forget is that, even if WB/DC was inclined to fire Amber Heard, "some people on Twitter hate her," is not an adequate reason that would stand up in court, and allegations from aggrieved exes aren't much better. Depp had the poor judgment to sue somebody and wound up with a court ruling that gave the Fantastic Beasts teams leverage to fire Johnny Depp. Give Amber credit for not being stupid enough to give them the rope to hang her with.
